data.title: Good for a bar
data.text: If you don't feel like getting out on the town in its a nice place to eat and drink . They have a good bar and a expansive menu . First time reviewing but long time customer . Good job Double Tree

data.title: Creative Menu
data.text: We enjoyed the food and the staff were great and super friendly. My wife got a great burger, I had a cheese steak and our son got the crab cakes.

data.title: Kids hangout spot
data.text: OK I thought I noticed lots of college age kids around the building when we checked in.  Come to find it this location is the weekend party spot for the underage drinking and smoking crowd. Tonight due to someone smoking in their room the fire alarm was set off at 3am. So we were awaken to a fire alarm and evacuated in the cold all because of pot heads smoking in their room.  Shameful

data.title: Room Service at Doubletree
data.text:
Considering we only used this restaurant for the room service it provided at the Doubletree- FANTASTIC! You must order the burger- super delicious and comes with a TON of fries.
The breakfast was wonderful as well- who doesn't like breakfast in bed?

data.title: Best Hotel Food I have ever Eaten!!!
data.text: The Chicken wings and the Caesar Salad with Grilled Shrimp was to die for!!!  :)  Of course, the Omelette station was also a personal favorite.

data.title: Good food and drinks
data.text:
The food is good. A decent number of options. I really liked the NY Steak, Sirlion Steak and Philly Cheese Steak. The only desert I've had (in the 4-5 times I've visited) is the Fried Banana Cheesecake (which isn't really a cheesecake but excellent none the less). The food is a bit on the expensive side but the portions are enough if you're a normal to slightly heavy eater.

The bar is decently stocked and gives good options for drinks as well.

I highly recommend this place.

data.title: Excellent Service and a Very Nice Atmosphere
data.text: We only had time for a quick dinner in between meetings, but the service was outstanding and very attentive. In the interest of time, we ordered outstanding burgers with our chosen side of fresh fruit.  The fruit (fresh chunks of pineapple, watermelon, cantaloupe and honeydew melon) was fantastic.  The waiter took the initiative to serve it early, so that we could stay on time.  My Quinoa & Black Bean burger with Roasted Pepper was awesome!  I ordered it with American Cheese.....good idea.  The hotel and restaurant is immaculate, quiet and comfortable.   Great experience.

data.title: Excellent food and prices
data.text:
My wife and I ate here while we stayed the weekend to see a concert at the Grand Opera House.  The staff was extremely professional and friendly. It seemed that they almost had a waiter/waitress for every table !  The food was fantastic.  My wife had their burger and it was cooked to perfection.  I had AND HIGHLY RECOMMEND the Metro grilled cheese which was absolutely delicious with cheddar , brie , dijon mustard , and granny smith apple slices on a toasted honey wheat bread. The sweet potatoes fries were also great.
 The hotel was very nice and I think I'd go back just for the food at the Metro !
